des:
Johnson Controls invented the room thermostat 135 years ago. With your family’s health and energy savings in mind, we reinvented it with the remotely controlled GLAS.

Short Description: The GLAS skill ensures seamless control of your GLAS thermostat with Alexa. Ensure the comfort of your spaces by asking Alexa to change your temperature preferences, set your modes, and make your space more comfortable.

Further Details/Description: The GLAS skill can only be used with the GLAS smart thermostat by Johnson Controls, Inc. To use this skill, you will need the following:
1. A powered-up GLAS thermostat
2. The latest version of the GLAS mobile app for iOS or Android
3. Credentials (username and password) for the GLAS account you created using the GLAS mobile app

After you have downloaded the GLAS skill, you must use your GLAS account credentials to link Alexa to the GLAS skill.

Using the GLAS skill for Alexa, you can:
1. Find out the current temperature of your room
2. Find out the current set-point of your GLAS thermostat
3. Set the operating mode of your GLAS thermostat
4. Change the set-point to X degrees
5. Adjust the set-point to be warmer or cooler by 2 degrees at a time
6. Raise or lower the set-point by X degrees
